attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned, petition Her Majesty's government to increase Great Britain's defence spending to the level it was at before the ill-thought-out Strategic Defence and Security Review (SDSR)  of 2010!

As demonstrated by the recent hostile action of a Russian cruiser fully armed with Guided Missiles towards the UK, we are still facing very large threats in our modern world and we cannot risk the safety of our citizens and our nation for the sake of 0.2% of GDP!
Is that really a risk worth taking?
